QA/QC Engineer -Structural Clients Handled : ADCO, ENOC,ADNOC,AL JABAR,TECTNIP,KENTZ ,Etc… Responsibi lities:  Reviewing all related documents like WPS, PQR, ITP and QAP  Follow and Implementation of all QA/QC procedure and Quality Plans  Responsible for stage wise welding, painting / coating inspection.  Monitor weather condition for surface preparation and painting / coating application.  Execute Painting / coating inspection work as per company / project inspection test plan.  To check and monitor all painting / coating rel ated works and ensure all final products meet in accordance with company procedure, client requirement and international codes.  Review all the related documents and release the fabrication Spools for packing and Loading.  Inspection of incoming materials an d hard stamping to be checked and cross check with MTC.  Ensure Latest fabrication drawings are available at site and being used for fabrication.  Weld preparation ( Bevel Preparation as per wps) with allowable tolerance to be ensured.  Dimensional requirement in each stage as required and weld visual inspection  Document control, Control of various Inspection and measuring tools, preparation of as built.  Preparing of all QA/QC Documents and gets approval from client and TPI Inspector  Assisting ISO Audit  Company : Coimbatore Industrial Radiographer, India Period : August 2012 to July 2014 Position : QA/QC Junior Inspector -NDT Responsibilities :  Document control, Control of various Inspection and measuring tools, preparation of as built.  Review the Standard and doing the Radiography Film Interpretation and Set up the equipment  Prepare test report for i. Accept ii. Reject iii. Rework  Be familiar with production processes of the test material and knowledge of type a nd location of expected defects  To develop RT,UT,MPT,DP technique for testing a particular job  Prepare written instruction for Level I, Guide and check test results of Level I operators  Company : Taneja Aerospace & Aviation Ltd , India. Period : July 2011 to July 2012 Position : Graduate Trainee -NDT Respon sibilities :  Review of Material Test Certificates, as per codes, Standard Client Specifications.  Review and Maintaining of PT,MT ,RT,UT-Instrument Calibration Certificates, Personal NDT Certificates, Batch Test Certificates for PT,MT, RT,UT consumables etc.,  As per the client’s procedures NDT inspection is done .
